item.description:
All,

After we are done canoeing this Saturday, we are planning to go see the new movie "The Informant" at AMC Lowes at Boston Common. The show is for 5:45pm, so if you are interested, come on down. I would suggest buying your tickets online just incase it gets sold out. Please try and get to the theater at 5:15is so we can coordinate outside and get seats together easily. Hope to see you all there. Let me know if you have any questions.

Vishal
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the main enterance of the theater on Tremont Street
item.name: Movie: The Informant
